#Attaching a Motorola C168i to an Arduino

= Making the cable =
On the top of the C168i is a 3/32 mini stereo jack.  This is also can be used as "hands-free" connection , but not both at the same time.  These 1/32 jack are usualy stocked at Radio Shack [http://www.radioshack.com/product/index.jsp?productId=2062449&cp=&sr=1&origkw=3%2F32&kw=3%2F32&parentPage=search 3/32" Stereo Plug]
